channel.title: Some one plz tell me how to portforward with netgear plz tell me

item.title: Some one plz tell me how to portforward with netgear plz tell me
item.dc:creator: @Shorty626 Shorty626
item.description:
@Shorty626 wrote:

Why would you hide your default gateway in that picture ROFL thats a local address, You cant do anything with it if you aren’t within that network…

Its 192.168.1.1 or 192.168.1.100 anyways, I already know it

item.title: Some one plz tell me how to portforward with netgear plz tell me
item.dc:creator: @waffle1 waffle`
item.description:
@waffle1 wrote:

On another topic

Waffle I never asked a stupied question, i never even seen you make a server so… Shut up?

I don’t code anymore due to the fact that I don’t have my own computer. Not to mention I know how to change the prices of things. PLUS, this is the help section, help him :o.

angelfallen:

when i got to portforward,com moparscape is not there nor is rsps

Moparscape won’t be in there angel, can you tell me what type of router you have?

Read full topic

item.title: Some one plz tell me how to portforward with netgear plz tell me
item.dc:creator: @waffle1 waffle`
item.description:
@waffle1 wrote:

[quote=“codexs, post:1, topic:268521”]Ok this is basicly easy router to portforward what you do is 1st

Start>>run>>cmd>>Ipconfig

Then you will get something like this
If you cannot see this is the direct link to the Picture http://img17.imageshack.us/content.php?page=done&l=img17/3563/35806250.jpg&via=mupload

Type your default gateway into the adress bar at the top and it will ask for a password normal it is username: Admin
password: password

if you add my email i will do it for you i can only get you to this ponit

Joe_dilkes@hotmail.com
Atleast try before you add me and
use www.portforward.com[/quote]

Rofl that helped absolutely none, worst guide ever. All you did was tell him how to ipconfig then type it in his web bar. So woo hoo he can access his router, thats the easiest thing to do in the world. You didn’t show him how to port forward, and you just told him the same thing I did, portforward.com.

Read full topic
item.source: Some one plz tell me how to portforward with netgear plz tell me

item.title: Some one plz tell me how to portforward with netgear plz tell me
item.dc:creator: @waffle1 waffle`
item.description:
@waffle1 wrote:

On another topic

Let me do this for ya www.google.com OMG!!! I broke a nail!

Chill out I’ve seen you ask stupid questions, like the one on how to change phat prices. That is easier than port forwarding, no point in being like that.

Read full topic

item.title: Some one plz tell me how to portforward with netgear plz tell me
item.dc:creator: @waffle1 waffle`
item.description:
@waffle1 wrote:

Please use the search bar or google. If you don’t find anything THEN post but theres a couple tuts around… maybe…

PortForward

Find your router and select a game, follow how to do it accept for the ports put “43594” instead of what ever the game they display requires.

If I knew what type of router you had I might be able to help better.

Read full topic
